common.title: Sleep Cycle Calculator
common.subtitle: Calculate your optimal bedtime based on sleep cycles to wake up refreshed

info.cycleLength: Each sleep cycle lasts approximately 90 minutes and includes light sleep, deep sleep, and REM sleep phases.
info.calculation: By calculating backwards from your desired wake-up time, we find the optimal bedtime that allows you to complete full sleep cycles.
info.wakeUpTip: Waking up at the end of a complete cycle helps you feel more refreshed and alert.
info.stageDescription: Each stage plays a crucial role in physical restoration, memory consolidation, and mental recovery.
